item.title: Telegram Drive
item.description:
Telegram Drive

Teldrive is a powerful utility that enables you to organise your telegram files and much more.
item.content:encoded:
Telegram Drive

Teldrive is a powerful utility that enables you to organise your telegram files and much more.

item.title: Dufs - A Simple Self Hosted File Server with Awesome Features
item.description:
Dufs - A Simple Self Hosted File Server with Awesome Features

A powerful, self hosted file indexing app that can also serve static pages!
